Name: BONSAI Ontology (Big Open Network for Sustainability Assessment Information)
Short description: The BONSAI ontologies provides elements of description for product footprint concepts defined in the bonsai.uno data base

Name: Core Ontology for Robotics and Automation
Short description: It was developed within the IEEE 1872-2015 Standard Ontologies for Robotics and Automation. Specifies core conceptions of Robotics domain.
Authors/creators: IEEE RAS Ontology for Robotics and Automation Working Group (IEEE RAS ORA WG)

Name: CORAX
Short description: It was developed to provide concepts which were to general for CORA ontology, but did not exist in SUMO ontology, such as design, interaction and artifical system.
Authors/creators: IEEE RAS Ontology for Robotics and Automation Working Group (IEEE RAS ORA WG)

Name: GoodRelations
Short description: GoodRelations is a standardized vocabulary for product, price, store, and company data that can (1) be embedded into existing static and dynamic Web pages and that (2) can be processed by other computers.

Name: Ontology for Autonomous Robotics
Short description: It defines robotic notions identified as fundamental for Autonomous Robotics.

Name: Ontology of units of Measure
Short description: The Ontology of units of Measure (OM) 2.0 models concepts and relations that underlie the formulation of quantitative knowledge in scientific research.

Name: Ontology pattern for life cycle assessment
Short description: These Ontology Design Pattern specifies key aspects of LCA/LCI data models, namely the notions of flows, activities, agents, and products, as well as their properties
Authors/creators: Krzysztof Janowicz,Adila A. Krisnadhi, Yingjie Hu,Sangwon Suh,Bo Pedersen Weidema,Beatriz Rivela,Johan Tivander,David E. Meyer,Gary Berg-Cross,Pascal Hitzler,Wesley Ingwersen,Brandon Kuczenski,Charles Vardeman,Yiting Ju,Michelle Cheatham

Name: ORArch
Short description: It elaborates notions related to hardware and software, as well as how these can be represented together in mixed architecture descriptions.

Name: Position Ontology
Short description: It extends SUMO and complements CORA and was developed for capturing the main concepts and relations underlying the notions of position, orientation and pose.
Authors/creators: IEEE RAS Ontology for Robotics and Automation Working Group (IEEE RAS ORA WG)

Name: Quantities, Units, Dimensions and Types ontology
Short description: QUDT presents a unified architecture for the conceptual representation of quantities, quantity kinds, units, dimensions, and data types, which lie at the core of all scientific and engineering inquiry.

Name: RPARTS
Short description: It was developed to provide concepts for CORA ontology to model robotic parts.
Authors/creators: IEEE RAS Ontology for Robotics and Automation Working Group (IEEE RAS ORA WG)

Name: schema.org
Short description: Schema.org is a collaborative, community activity with a mission to create, maintain, and promote schemas for structured data on the Internet.
Authors/creators: Many contributors both from companies and volunteers.

Name: Suggested Upper Merged Ontology
Short description: The Suggested Upper Merged Ontology (SUMO) and its domain ontologies form the largest formal public ontology in existence today. They are being used for research and applications in search, linguistics and reasoning.

Name: Volkswagen Vehicles Ontology (from IndustryPortal)
Short description: A vocabulary for describing Volkswagen-specific features of automobiles and their components
Authors/creators: Abdelouadoud Rasmi,Charles Sandeman-Craik,Chris Jenkins,Tim Redding,Yago Otero,William Greenly,Robin Dingle
